Nemesis Enforcer/Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:

::Nemesis swoops down, hearing gunfire, and notices a hiding Wolfgang::
(Nemesis thinks to himself: Hmmm...a perfect oppertunity)
"Nemesis Enforcer, transform." (The Alliance member says almost silently to 
himself, transforming to his biped mode, slowly dropping to a tree)
::Pulling out his missile launcher from subspace, Nemesis fires the last 
rocket in the weapon of destruction down at Wolfgang from above::

=============================================================

::Stinkbomb and Ramhorn stepped out of CR chambers, looking to Striker and 
nodding::

::Ramhorn looks to Striker as Stinkbomb charges off towards his quarters 
annoyed at being so easily overtaken by Nemesis Enforcer:: "Did you hear what 
the crazy fool, Liono, tried to do?  A cloaking device around the Ark?!  I 
think someone needs to slap him back into reality, he's going to get us 
killed.  Well, anyway, I have scanner duty, see you around, Striker."
::Ramhorn walks off::
